Velocity is our very own website theme, having a powerful impact for clients in a range of industries. Developed for over 6 years, now at version 8.5.71.

Our high-performance, lead generation website theme. Packed with everything a business needs in their website. Pay once, own forever.

Developed over 5 years

Velocity was designed simply to help businesses to have a high-performance website that generates more sales and streamlines customer processes. Developed over 5 years with 2,500+ contributions. Completely customisable, infinitely extendable.

Pricing

30+ Integrations

Connect with business platforms to automate processes.

Already deeply built-in to Velocity, Google GTag Ad Conversion Tracking and Meta Pixel Conversion Tracking.

User contact information is instantly send and stored in the CRM, then instantly send to your email address for improving conversion rate with faster response times.

Generate more sales, more easily with Velocity and Stripe. Working together out of the box so you can be selling online from day one.

One-click checkout is shown to improve conversion rates across the board, we have Google Pay and Apple Pay integrated with your site straight away.

Write beautiful, informative blog posts with our MDX powered blogging system integrated into Velocity. One of the most flexible blogging languages for storing data, highly compatible with other blog formats for migrating old posts.

We employ the power of both Netlify CDN and Bunny CDN to create one of the most responsive network payloads possible. Delivering your website to devices from the closest possible location, everytime.

Customised in 21 Days

Offering a more personal format of web design and digital marketing, all Velocity packages include multiple revisions of your website with me in-person, video call available. Completely inclusive web design from content and image optimisation, to keyword and competitor research.

Design

All Velocity packages include mock up revisions, done over video call with screen share for best results.

04

Moonshot

Expert management always in your corner. Combining web design, brand design and marketing in one.

80+ Components

Pre-designed components to help all development move faster.

Velocity from the ground up is a form of guardrail for keeping your website neat, tidy and user-friendly. With a range of included page layouts and component areas pre-designed, then customised to your brand. All Velocity components are developed to be responsive to a minimum of 4 screen sizes, compared to usual development of 2-3.

Integrated with Stripe to provide secure payment processing and product listing. Including ApplyPay and GPay integrations.

Multiple slider designs with a lightning fast framework are deeply integrated through-out Velocity. One of the biggest hurdles of web design, already conqured thanks to Velocity.

Integrated connection with Netlify CRM for customer information management. Secure form handling out of the box at no extra cost.

Velocity is one of the most high-ranking SEO themes available. Using web-performance and web-standard compliance to get your business seen more.

Velocity is sold with a lifetime license so you can pay once, own forever. Our code is able to be managed by anyone you choose, and we are always available for future work or changes at extremely fair rates.
